# Pain Strike, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Witch Spells|Witch 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 234

This spell works like *[[Pain Strike (Spell)|pain strike]],* except as noted above.
